Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.pizzeria.pizzeria.workers.baker

Interface Baker

All Known Implementing Classes:
BakerImpl
public interface Baker
A representation of a baker, who can start working, stop working or run away from work.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isWorking()
    Returns if this baker is working.
    void
    start()
    Initiates baker's work.
    void
    stop()
    Allows to complete current task and then leave the goddamn pizzeria.

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start()
      Initiates baker's work.

    • stop

      void stop()
      Allows to complete current task and then leave the goddamn pizzeria.

    • isWorking

      boolean isWorking()
      Returns if this baker is working. This method returns false if a worker received stop(), though he is allowed to finish his tasks.
      Returns:
      true if this baker is working
